title: Atulugama murder:Suspect remanded
body_lines: The suspect who was arrested in connection with the murder of a nine-year-old girl in Atulugama, Bandaragama was remanded till tomorrow by the Panadura Magistrate today.
A kottu roti maker was arrested being the main suspect in the murder of nine-year-old Fatima Ayesha of Atulugama.
